content.en: Variational Inequality Algorithms: Researchers have developed various algorithms to solve different types of variational inequality problems. These algorithms use projection techniques and function evaluation to find solutions to these problems. The algorithms are designed to handle different scenarios, such as non-monotone variational inequalities and multi-valued variational inequalities. These methods have potential applications in a wide range of fields.
content.da: Variationsulighedsalgoritmer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at løse forskellige typer variationulighedsproblemer. Disse algoritmer bruger projektionsteknikker og funktionsvurdering til at finde løsninger på disse problemer. Algoritmerne er designet til at håndtere forskellige scenarier, såsom ikke-monotone variationuligheder og flerværdig variationsuligheder. Disse metoder har potentiale til anvendelse i en bred vifte af felter.
